arts.sum: Manchester United travel to London on Saturday to face their recent bogey team, Tottenham Hotspur. The Red Devils are currently on their best league run under Rúben Amorim. In fact, they are unbeaten in their last four games (W3, D1). Furthermore, they have benefited from a full week of preparation for this match. arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Manchester United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur host Manchester United in a crucial Saturday lunchtime kick-off. Both clubs are level on 17 points in a tight race for the European places. Spurs will draw confidence from their midweek Champions League win. However, they must overcome a severe injury crisis. arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim admits he is lucky to still be in a job as he goes head-to-head with Tottenham for the first time since bitter Europa League final defeat
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: Ruben Amorim admits he is lucky to still be in a job at Manchester United after losing the Europa League final to Tottenham in May.

arts.ttl: Tottenham attacker 'touch and go' for Man Utd clash
arts.sum: Ahead of Tottenham Hotspur's Premier League clash against Manchester United, Thomas Frank confirms that Mohammed Kudus is “touch and go” to feature.

arts.ttl: 65 years later: Spurs out to equal club winning record in Man Utd clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur will endeavour to match a 65-year winning record and set a new club Premier League first when they pit their wits against Manchester United in Saturday's early kickoff.
